sentences.en: Another worry is that telecommunication systems may isolate people from each other.
sentences.cn: 另一种让人担心的事情就是这些通讯系统很可能会把人和人给隔绝开了.

sentences.en: Do not isolate yourself from others.
Gandhi said that those who isolate religion from politics don't understand the nature of either.
sentences.cn: 甘地说过，那些主张政教分离者对两者的本质都不了解。

sentences.en: In short successful traders isolate themselves from the opinions of others.
sentences.cn: 简单地说,成功的交易者不为别人的意见所左右.

sentences.en: Political influence is being used to shape public opinion and isolate critics.
sentences.cn: 政治影响正被用来左右公众舆论，使批评家们陷于孤立。

sentences.en: She will isolate herself and give him the silent treat - ment.
The cephalic veins are sometimes difficult to isolate.
sentences.cn: 部分患者分离头静脉存在困难。

sentences.en: The salient object of last Friday's performance was obviously to isolate Poland.
sentences.cn: 上星期五那一幕戏的主要目标,显然在于孤立波兰.

sentences.en: The town was isolated by the floods.
sentences.cn: 洪水使该镇与外界隔绝。

sentences.en: The US has sought to isolate Cuba both economically and politically.
sentences.cn: 美国一直想在经济和政治上孤立古巴。

sentences.en: The white people are unable to isolate the black.
Their solution was to isolate specific clones of B cells and fuse them with cancer cells.
sentences.cn: 他们的解决方案是分离出特定的B细胞克隆，然后将它们和癌细胞结合。

sentences.en: This justifies sophisticated experiments which are designed to isolate specific relationships.
sentences.cn: 此时,为了把一些特定关系孤立出来而设计的简化试验就是合理的了.

sentences.en: Use spot meter to isolate bridge roof, then shady side of bridge.
sentences.cn: 用特写仪把桥顶单独划出, 然后是桥的背阴影面.

sentences.en: We can use genetic engineering techniques to isolate the gene that is responsible.
sentences.cn: 我们可以使用基因工程技术把相关基因分离出来。

sentences.en: We should never isolate ourselves from the masses.
sentences.cn: 我们永远不能脱离群众.

sentences.en: You don't have to isolate them from the community.
sentences.cn: 你没必要把他们与社区隔离。

words.tran_cn: 孤立的；分离的；单独的；[电] 绝缘的
孤立主义的；孤立主义者的
隔离；孤立；[电] 绝缘；[化学] 离析
使孤立；使绝缘；脱离（isolate的过去分词）

trans.tran_en: to separate one person, group, or thing from other people or things

trans.tran_cn: 使隔离，使孤立，[电]使绝缘，[化]使离析，[微]使细菌分离
trans.tran_en: to separate one person, group, or thing from other people or things
